shortcuts.title: Quick Search
shortcuts.description: Pressing __P__ puts the cursor in the module search bar at the top for easy navigation to a module's homepage.

shortcuts.title: Timetable Builder
shortcuts.description: Pressing __B__ will quickly jump you to the Timetable Builder page.

shortcuts.title: Modules
shortcuts.description: Pressing __M__ will quickly jump you to the Modules Catalogue page.

shortcuts.title: Preferences
shortcuts.description: Pressing __P__ will quickly jump you to the Preferences page.

shortcuts.title: Add modules to timetable
shortcuts.description: Pressing __.__ will focus on the search box where you can add modules to the timetable.

shortcuts.title: Show module's timetable
shortcuts.description: Pressing __T__ will display the lesson timetable tab of the module.

shortcuts.title: Show Corspedia
shortcuts.description: Pressing __C__ will display the CORS bidding history tab of the module.

shortcuts.title: Show reviews and discussions
shortcuts.description: Pressing __R__ will display the reviews and discussions tab of the module.

shortcuts.title: Switch theme
shortcuts.description: Pressing __←__ and __→__ will switch between the available theme colours for modules in the timetable builder.
